transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji sir.
Customer: Haan sir bataiye.
Executive: Toh aapka sir yeh issue hai ki jo aapka account hai woh kisi aur ke bhi phone mein login ho gaya toh usko logout karwana hai aapko, right?
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Theek hai. Toh aap ek kaam kariye sir apne mobile phone ka jo na app open kariye IndiaMART ka.
Customer: Ek minute sir kar raha hu.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Kar liya sir.
Executive: Ab waha pe aap jaiye left hand side pe teen line dikh rahi hongi aapko.
Customer: Left hand right pe dikh rahi hai teen bindi left mein dikh rahi hai teen line.
Executive: Haan ji teen line pe click kariye.
Customer: Ji sir. Ab waha pe sabse niche click kar diya sir.
Executive: Haan sabse niche jaiye setting mein, sabse niche jaiye setting mein.
Customer: Setting mein chala gaya sir.
Executive: Seedhe haath ki taraf upar jo hai teen bindi dikh rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Haan sir dikh rahi hai isme aa rahi hai logout from all device.
Executive: Logout from all device pe click kariye.
Customer: Kar diya sir logout ho gaya.
Executive: Logout ho gaya? Ab dobara se jo hai usko jo hai IndiaMART app ko open kar rakha hai na aapne usme aapka number hi aa raha hoga jo registered number hai aapka wohi dikh raha hai 98 wala?
Customer: Haan yeh yeh yeh haan yeh sir aa raha hai yeh mujhe dikha raha hai ki continue dikha raha hai.
Executive: Haan continue pe click kariye.
Customer: Continue pe click kar diya sir.
Executive: Ab OTP aayega aapke number pe login ho gaya woh?
Customer: Haan you have been logout please login ab ab ab aayega sir.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Yeh Fornis moulding mein deal karte hai kya aap sir?
Customer: Are haan sir yeh verify abhi.
Customer: Verify now. Yeh toh Gmail pe ja raha hai sir.
Executive: Gmail verify nahi hogi na aapki is wajah se woh login nahi ho raha hoga.
Executive: Toh aap ek kaam kariye aap us pe click kariye verify now pe click kariye.
Customer: Nahi sir Gmail pe aa gaya sir.
Executive: Gmail pe OTP aaya hoga na?
Customer: Aa gaya sir.
Executive: Woh daal dijiye waha pe.
Customer: Daal raha hu sir.
Customer: Daal diya sir chal gaya.
Executive: Login ho gaya sir?
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Theek hai. Ek second sir.
Customer: Haan sir ab ab ab sab mein band ho gaya yeh sab mein band ho gaya.
Executive: Sabke phono mein se logout ho gaya kahin bhi agar login hua hoga na toh woh logout ho gaya hoga aur aur abhi ab kabhi bhi woh kabhi koi bhi login karne ki koshish karega toh woh bina OTP ke kar nahi payega. Email ID toh aapki lagi hui hai na isme?
Customer: Haan sir mera hi number hai.
Executive: Achha Fornis moulding mein deal karte hai aap sir?
Customer: Haan sir karta hu bilkul. Yeh yeh dikha raha tha mere ko ki yeh add nahi hai aapki catalog mein isko add karwa du?
Customer: Sir add karwa do please hai thoda aisa hai na main na thoda abhi naya naya kaam start kiya hai idhar ab main phone bhi chalata hu na jyada mujhe pehle iski editing hoti nahi hai sir.
Executive: Achha koi baat nahi hum aapko samjha denge kaise kaise isko use karna hai kya kya cheeze aapko dhyan mein rakhni hai na woh sab hum samjha denge sari cheeze ek baar video meeting se aapse connect kar lenge aur phir hum usko jo hai aapko sari cheezo ko samjha denge. Call wagera nahi aa rahi aapke paas direct buyers ki waise toh do call aayi hai woh toh aapne uthai hi nahi thi.
Customer: Ji sir?
Executive: Do call aayi thi buyers ki woh toh aapne pick up kar hi li thi.
Customer: Abhi aayi nahi. Customer customer ki do call aayi thi na abhi matlab jabse aapne service li hai.
Customer: Haan sir aayi main toh nahi kar paya sir unko.
Executive: Aapne baat nahi kari?
Customer: Main sir yeh call aati hai na kai baar mujhe pata nahi hai bolte nahi hai jaise Hindi se.
Customer: Yeh mail pe kuch mail aati hai na uska nahi pata mujhe toh. Aise pata hai sir ki mail check kiya karo mail pe kuch inquiry aati hai direct.
Executive: Aap mujhe batao ki aap kab tak jo hai apne office wagera mein pahunch jaoge ya phir main kal ka ek time rakh leta hu aapke saath kal ko ek baar video meeting pe aake dobara samajhte hai.
Customer: Sir sir mujhe aap kabhi kar lena sir 10 baje baad sir.
Executive: 10 baje ke baad?
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Achha aapne abhi helpline pe call kiya tha na toh woh call jo hai hamare paas concern open ho jata hai toh main usko close kar du sir?
Customer: Sir kar do.
Executive: Agar aap satisfied hai apne problem se jo problem hui?
Customer: Main satisfied hu koi dikkat nahi hai sir itni help karoge itna guide karoge ek aap satisfied nahi honge yeh bande.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir woh aapse puchna zaruri hota hai na aapki permission ke bina usko band nahi kar sakte toh main usko band kar raha hu aapke paas mere regarding ek feedback aayega abhi.
Customer: Theek hai sir koi dikkat nahi hai. Usme feedback mein aap satisfied mark kar dena please.
Executive: Theek kar dunga sir. Theek hai abhi aayega mail pe jab aap pahunch jao toh tab kar dena sir.
Customer: Theek hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai. Ek baar sir main phir aapko kal connect kar leta hu.
Customer: Theek hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's account logged in on another phone.

- Unable to edit catalog, needs assistance.

- Missed buyer calls, difficulty understanding inquiries.



Resolution:

- Executive helped log out account from other devices.

- Explained the process to verify Gmail.

- Offered assistance with catalog editing via video call.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect for video call tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- account, logout, catalog, verification, video call
